item.title: 迈克尔-赛勒的 "战略 "在最近一次购买后拥有 3% 的比特币流通量
item.description: 迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）的 "战略"（Strategy）公司在最近购买了原始加密货币之后，现在拥有比特币铸造总量的 3% 以上。【原文：Michael Saylor’s Strategy now owns more than 3% of all the Bitcoin ever minted following the crypto treasury company’s latest purchase of the original cryptocurrency.】

item.title: 中国中信将在安哥拉开发大型大豆和玉米农场
item.description: 在与美国的贸易战中，世界第二大经济体寻求确保长期供应，中国国有企业集团中信集团有限公司的一个部门将在安哥拉开发大规模的大豆和玉米农场。【原文：A unit Chinese state-owned conglomerate Citic Ltd. will develop large-scale soybean and corn farms in Angola, as the world’s second-largest economy seeks to secure long-term supply amid a trade war with the US.】

item.title: 普京下令俄联邦安全局审查爆炸后进入俄罗斯港口的船只
item.description: 在油轮发生一系列神秘爆炸事件后，弗拉基米尔-普京总统收紧了从国外进入俄罗斯海港的船只规则，让国家主要安全部门发挥更大作用。【原文：President Vladimir Putin has tightened rules for ships entering Russian sea ports from abroad, giving the nation’s main security service a bigger role following a series of mysterious blasts on oil tankers.】

item.title: 调查显示，企业认为加拿大可摆脱最糟糕的关税结果
item.description: 央行的调查显示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普贸易政策的不确定性正在抑制加拿大的商业投资和消费支出，尽管企业认为加拿大经济避免了严重衰退。【原文：Uncertainty about US President Donald Trump’s trade policy is curbing Canadian business investment and consumer spending, though firms see the economy avoiding a bad recession, central bank surveys show.】

item.title: 加密货币博彩网站 Polymarket 达成收购小型交易所协议后将重返美国市场
item.description: 被联邦监管机构踢出海外的加密博彩平台Polymarket，在检察官终止对该公司的调查仅几周后，就达成了重返美国市场的协议。【原文：Polymarket, the crypto-betting platform that was kicked offshore by federal regulators, has struck a deal to return to the US market just weeks after prosecutors shut down a probe of the company.】

item.title: 特朗普拥抱加密货币，BitGo秘密申请美国IPO
item.description: 加密货币托管公司BitGo Holdings Inc.周一表示，在数字资产市场一片乐观之际，该公司已秘密申请首次公开募股。【原文：Crypto custody firm BitGo Holdings Inc. said Monday it has confidentially filed for an initial public offering amid a wave of optimism on the digital asset market.】

item.title: 特斯拉将对抗加州对其过度夸大自动驾驶功能的指控
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc. ）将与加利福尼亚州机动车辆管理局（California Department of Motor Vehicles）交锋，声称该公司夸大了其自动驾驶和完全自动驾驶技术的功能，误导了消费者。【原文：Tesla Inc. is set to face off with the California Department of Motor Vehicles over claims that the company has exaggerated the capabilities of its Autopilot and Full Self-Driving technology and misled consumers.】

item.title: 三星 Galaxy Watch 8 评测：极致设计中无处不在的人工智能
item.description:
如果用户能够接受大胆的新外观，他们会发现其中包含的人工智能功能非常实用。【原文：

If users can tolerate the bold new look, they’ll find the included artificial intelligence features are actually useful.

】

item.title: 私募基金削减杠杆贷款银行的并购和费用
item.description: 英国最大的私立学校运营商之一、西班牙废物管理公司和汉堡王欧洲快餐特许经营公司有什么共同点？它们的私募股权所有者都在为不需要债务承销商的销售做准备。【原文：What do one of the largest private-school operators in the UK, a Spanish waste management company and a European fast food franchise of Burger King have in common? Their private equity owners are readying sales that don’t need debt underwriters.】

item.title: 美国股市在财报密集周前屡创新高
item.description: 美国股市周一走高，交易员们为本周繁忙的财报做准备，特斯拉公司和 Alphabet 公司等大公司将公布财报。【原文：US equities advanced on Monday as traders prepared for a busy week of earnings, with big names such as Tesla Inc. and Alphabet Inc. set to report.】

item.title: 优步在洛杉矶保险欺诈诉讼案中指控夸大伤者账单
item.description: 优步科技公司正在起诉洛杉矶的一群律师和医疗服务提供商，称他们进行了欺诈性保险索赔，导致公司损失了数百万美元的法律费用—；这是该公司今年提起的第三起此类诉讼。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. is suing a group of lawyers and medical providers in Los Angeles who it says have made fraudulent insurance claims that cost the company millions in legal fees — the third such lawsuit it’s filed this year.】

item.title: 美国集装箱运量受关税影响将大幅逆转
item.description: 一项民间数据显示，承载美国进口货物的海运集装箱数量连续第二个月下降，这使得美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税扰乱了从国外购买商品的行为，从而使这一经济指标出现了有记录以来最大幅度的同比逆转。【原文：The number of shipping containers carrying US imports fell for a second straight month, a private gauge showed, putting the economic indicator on course for one of the sharpest year-on-year reversals on record as President Donald Trump’s tariffs disrupt purchases of goods from abroad.】

item.title: 国防承包商股票前景光明，华尔街看到了机会
item.description: 美国航空航天类股票近期一路飙升，但分析师们却从它们经常被归为一类的滞后类股票中看到了机会：国防承包商。【原文：US aerospace stocks have been soaring recently, but analysts see opportunities in a lagging cohort they’re often clumped with: defense contractors.】

item.title: 特朗普媒体为加密货币财政计划购买 20 亿美元比特币
item.description: Truth Social 背后的公司 Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. 已经收购了约 20 亿美元的比特币和相关证券，这是该公司之前宣布的成为一家加密货币财务公司计划的一部分。【原文：Trump Media & Technology Group Corp., the firm behind Truth Social, has acquired about $2 billion in Bitcoin and related securities as part of its previously announced plan to become a crypto treasury company.】

item.title: 美国最大油田有毒水泄漏，页岩钻探者反目成仇
item.description: 从德克萨斯州和新墨西哥州二叠纪盆地油井中涌出的有毒水引发了环境问题，甚至引发了地震。现在，这个问题已经变得非常严重，以至于生产商之间都开始互相攻击。【原文：The toxic water that gushes out of oil wells in the Permian Basin of Texas and New Mexico has spurred environmental concerns and even earthquakes. Now the problem has become so acute that it’s turning producers against one another.】

item.title: 机构推动 4 万亿美元加密货币市场浪潮，华盛顿特区的举措为该领域注入活力
item.description: 在华盛顿一系列政策措施的推动下，一股无情的乐观浪潮正在席卷近 4 万亿美元的加密货币市场，加速了加密货币与受监管金融的同化。具有里程碑意义的稳定币法的通过和更广泛的立法势头为该行业注入了新的合法性，提升了价格，重新点燃了整个数字资产的风险偏好。【原文：A relentless wave of optimism is sweeping the nearly $4 trillion crypto market, driven by a frenzy of Washington policy moves accelerating its assimilation into regulated finance. The passage of a landmark stablecoin law and broader legislative momentum have injected new legitimacy into the sector, lifting prices and rekindling risk appetite across digital assets.】

item.title: 印度计划允许下一季出口食糖以避免过剩
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，印度可能会允许当地糖厂在 10 月份开始的下一榨季出口食糖，因为早期迹象表明甘蔗将获得大丰收。【原文：India may permit local mills to export sugar in the next season that starts in October as early signs suggest a bumper cane harvest, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法国电力因风电激增而下滑，与德国的差距进一步拉大
item.description: 多风的天气导致法国电力价格下滑，扩大了与德国的折扣，但如果 8 月份再次出现热浪，预计这一趋势将发生逆转。【原文：Windier weather caused French power prices to slump, widening a discount with Germany, but the trend is expected to flip if heat waves return in August.】

item.title: 印度调查 40 家煤炭进口商是否高估货物价值
item.description: 印度煤炭部长基山-雷迪（G. Kishan Reddy）周一表示，印度正在调查 40 家煤炭进口商涉嫌为印尼货物开具超额发票的问题。【原文：India is investigating 40 coal importers for suspected over-invoicing of Indonesian cargoes, Coal Minister G. Kishan Reddy said Monday.】

item.title: 贝森特称中国谈判可能包括购买俄罗斯和伊朗石油
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，下一轮中美会谈可能包括讨论中国购买俄罗斯和伊朗石油的问题，这表明双方的焦点可能从更传统的贸易问题转向涉及国家安全的问题。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the next round of US-China talks could include a discussion of China’s purchases of Russian and Iranian oil, a signal that the focus could shift from more traditional trade issues to ones that cross over into matters of national security.】

item.title: 激进投资者埃利奥特增持数据中心 REIT Equinix 股份
item.description: 知情人士透露，埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）已增持 Equinix Inc.【原文：Elliott Investment Management has built up its stake in Equinix Inc. and is pushing the data center operator to take steps to boost its share price, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: Meta 的高科技 Oakleys 为运动人群带来智能眼镜
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司为其智能眼镜赋予了运动风格和更高的价格。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is giving its smart glasses a premium, athletic twist — and a higher price tag.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚企业警告石油公司劳动改革将导致裁员和成本上升
item.description: 哥伦比亚的保安公司和医院警告说，由于总统古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）推动提高工人福利的连锁效应，将出现裁员和成本激增。【原文：Colombia’s security firms and hospitals are warning of job cuts and surging costs as a knock-on effect of President Gustavo Petro’s push to boost worker benefits.】

item.title: 金融科技公司 OCN 将投资 1.5 亿美元拓展墨西哥市场
item.description: 据一份新闻稿称，为临时工提供汽车租赁模式的墨西哥金融科技公司 OCN 将在墨西哥投资 1.5 亿美元，帮助扩大该国主要城市的叫车司机的用车范围。【原文：Mexican fintech OCN, which offers car rental models for gig workers, will invest $150 million in Mexico to help expand vehicle access for ride-hailing drivers in key cities in the country, according to a press release.】

item.title: CoreWeave 计划出售 15 亿美元债券为债务再融资
item.description: 据一份新闻稿称，人工智能计算能力提供商 CoreWeave 公司计划发行 15 亿美元的优先票据，部分资金将用于债务再融资。【原文：CoreWeave Inc., a provider of AI computing power, plans to offer $1.5 billion of senior notes that will be used in part to refinance debt, according to a release.】

item.title: 西藏大坝对中国 GDP 的贡献远大于电力供应
item.description:
该国计划在喜马拉雅山修建一个水力发电项目，其发电量超过波兰全国的发电量。【原文：

The nation plans to build a hydropower project in the Himalayas with more capacity than all of Poland.

】

item.title: 通用电气弗诺瓦公司收购人工智能公司，帮助公用事业公司检查电网损坏情况
item.description: GE Vernova 公司正在收购法国软件公司 Alteia SAS，这家发电设备制造商希望利用人工智能加强电网建设。【原文：GE Vernova Inc. is acquiring French software company Alteia SAS as the maker of power generation equipment looks to use artificial intelligence for ways to strengthen the electric grid.】

item.title: 新泽西州和纽约市有望从举办世界杯中获益 33 亿美元
item.description: 纽约市和新泽西州官员预计，2026 年举办国际足联世界杯将为该地区带来 33 亿美元的经济增长。【原文：New York City and New Jersey officials are projecting a $3.3 billion economic boost to the region from hosting the FIFA World Cup in 2026.】

item.title: 以色列打击胡塞武装在也门港口的目标以阻止导弹发射
item.description: 周一，以色列袭击了胡塞武装在也门荷台达港的目标，以报复该组织在上周发射的一系列导弹。【原文：Israel struck Houthi targets in Yemen’s port of Hodeida on Monday, in retaliation for a series of missile volleys from the group over the last week.】

item.title: X 表示将抵制 "出于政治动机 "的法国调查
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司表示，在对社交媒体平台算法涉嫌存在偏见和操纵行为的调查中，它不会满足法国当局的要求。【原文：Elon Musk’s X said it won’t accede to French authorities’ demands in a probe into alleged bias and manipulation of the social media platform’s algorithm.】
